p: The specific media required for cell growth, such as: Dulbecco’s modified Eagle medium (DMEM), Eagle’s minimal essential medium (EMEM), and dermal cell basal medium were purchased from ATTC (LGC Standards GmbH, Wesel, Germany). Other specific reagents for cell culture—Trypsin/EDTA solution, phosphate buffer saline (PBS), antibiotic mixture, fetal calf serum (FCS) and Trypan blue solution were obtained from Sigma Aldrich (Munich, Germany), whereas the 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide—MTT kit was purchased from Roche Diagnostics GmbH (Mannheim, Germany).
